doc.title: 15 Most Shocking Political Sex Scandals
doc.plot: They say politics make strange bedfellows. The politicians on this list found that out the hard way, especially when their "bedfellows" ended up splashed all over the front pages. Sex scandals are nothing new in Washington but every time an illicit relationship is uncovered, we can't wait to dish the dirt. In this two hour stunt are the 15 most shocking affairs that rocked the country.
